title: Add QR Code and Shareable Link for Kare2U Website

requirements.text: Add a 'Share Our Site' section or modal accessible from the site (e.g., a button in the Header or Footer) that displays a generated QR code image pointing to the Kare2U website URL, along with the full shareable URL as copyable text and a 'Copy Link' button that copies the URL to the clipboard. Style it using the Kare2U brand palette (light blue, soft green, white) with rounded corners and a clean layout.

quotes: make us a qr code and link

acceptanceCriteria: A QR code is displayed that encodes the Kare2U website URL
The shareable URL is shown as readable text beneath or beside the QR code
A 'Copy Link' button copies the URL to the clipboard when clicked
The QR code and link UI uses the Kare2U brand palette and rounded styling
The feature is accessible from the Header or Footer without breaking existing navigation

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
QR code must be generated client-side on the frontend â€” no backend changes required
Use a frontend QR code library (e.g., qrcode.react) to generate the code dynamically
nonGoals: No backend changes for QR code or link generation
